what: Pulls Data from NRC's ADAMS database
title: Pulls Data from NRC's ADAMS database
text: R package used pull data NRC’s ADAMS document repository. ever want keep track recent back forth applicants NRC find NRC web based ADAMS searches cumbersome? , package might !

title: Pulls Data from NRC's ADAMS database
text: R package based tidyverse, R tidyverse installation recommended. Web based ADAMS results processed xml, xml2 package prerequisite. package programmed using base R pipes, versions R greater 4.1 required. Please install package using devtools: package unlikely pushed CRAN.

title: Pulls Data from NRC's ADAMS database
text: nrcadams package fairly limited time. key functionality runs search_docket. least one docket number required, can filter results specifying many days past want search well search terms. function outputs tibble results including URLs documents.
code: ACU_MSRR <- c(99902088, 05000610) ACU_MSRR |>   nrcadams::search_docket(     days_back = 20,     search_term = "Acceptance"     )

text: DocketNumber dbl/vector Docket number (numbers) searched ADAMS search_term chr search term desired. Default nothing (.e., NULL) days_back dbl Length time search extends days? Default time (.e, NULL)

title: Conduct ADAMS Search — search_docket
Conduct ADAMS Search — search_docket
code: nrcadams::search_docket(c(99902088, 05000610)) #> Searching with the following URL: #>  https://adams.nrc.gov/wba/services/search/advanced/nrc?q=(mode:sections,sections:(filters:(public-library:!t),properties_search_any:!(!(DocketNumber,eq,'99902088',''),!(DocketNumber,eq,'05000610',''))))&qn=New&tab=content-search-pars&z=0 #> Error in open.connection(x, "rb"): Timeout was reached: [adams.nrc.gov] Connection timeout after 10000 ms
